message.body: Hey sorry for the late notice but ive got a naaasty cold and dont want to get you or Ella sick this afternoon. Sorry! Hope its not too hard to find a sitter.
Oh no, poor thing. No problem, feel better
Thanks and talk to you later!
Ella is obsessed with her lost ds-is it really missing or "lost" because she played it too much? Just checking in haha
Ha, it seems to be lost. But I think she had it last in her bedroom, so if she is looking, check around or under the bed
Haha okay just making sure im playin on your team!
Thanks for checking! Sorry if she drives you crazy with this gaga
Haha I mean
Its alright-we took it as an opportunity to clean!
Is there any chance that you are free to meet Ella after school tomorrow? I pulled my back and made a drs appointment
Sorry i have previous babysitting obligations. Feel better!
It's ok, thanks!
Sorry for the late notice but i cant sit for you tomorrow i've got bronchitis and have to head to the doc tomorrow! Thanks for understanding.
Oh no, poor thing! Don't worry about it, just get yourself better, lady! Good luck at the drs, take care xo
Hey just checking in i'm on for childcare tomorrow-but i have to run out at 530 for another gig. Does that work for you?Hope you're well!
Yeah, that is no problem, see you tomorrow!
Excellent thanks so much.
Hey, do you have anything to do tonight? I was wondering if I could stay and get some work done?
I am available from 315 on. Until what time would you need me to stay with small fry?
Just till like six or six thirty would be awesome, thanks!!
No prob. Let me know when youll be back.
Ok I will let u know when I'm leaving campus
Also, the door to my room is latched so the cats don't fuck with the plants while no one is home, you guys can unlatch it once you are there, if Ella wants to go in
Thanks i wasnt sure if it was for her or cats!
On my way!
Ok dokes
Your street is blocked by cones by the school! Should i wait for ella on the corner?
Nevermind the bus still came down street!
Could u have Ella start her homework? We need tu go to target l8r
Ok no prob.
Thnx!!
Leaving a little late, see you soon!
Ok dokes
